Name: homeState
Description: Spell out home state

Name: homeStateAbbr
Description: Home state postal abbreviation

Name: homeStateKey
Description: Home state USDA numeric code

Name: herdsWebServiceURL
Description: URL to actual HERDS webservice (https required if secure)

Name: brokenLIDs
Description: Check if state premises identifiers are NOT actual registered LIDs

Name: stateIDChecksum
Description: Check if state premises identifiers have checksum (early HERDS do not)

Name: standAlone
Description: Check to run without webservice

Name: defaultReceivedDate
Description: Check to set received date to today if data (.CVI or CO/KS) file opened

Name: defaultDirection
Description: Form opens with either import or export selected

Name: cviValidDays
Description: Days CVIs are valid in home state.  Used for error checking.

Name: saveCopies
Description: Check to copy original (PDF) to Output folder

Name: smallScreen
Description: Check if normal display doesn't fit in screen. A smaller, scrollable configuration will be used.

Name: rotation
Description: Degrees to rotate PDF display by default.

Name: defaultPurpose
Description: Default value for purpose of movement drop down

Name: autoOpenPdf
Description: Check to automatically open undisplayable PDFs in Acrobat.

Name: smtpHost
Description: DNS name or IP address of email host

Name: smtpPort
Description: IP Port for email on email host

Name: smtpSecurity
Description: Type of security used by email host

Name: smtpDomain
Description: Email domain of host starting with @

Name: emailFrom
Description: Email address for FROM line of emails sent from Civet

Name: emailReplyTo
Description: Email address for REPLY TO line of emails sent from Civet

Name: emailTestTo
Description: Email address for TESTING.  Prevents email from being sent to actual state vets.

Name: emailCopyTo
Description: Email address for cc of outgoing emails.  Especially good during early testing and use.

Name: maxAttachSize
Description: Maximum size of attachments on any one email.  In bytes, add K or M for kilobytes of megabytes.  (5M for five megabytes).

Name: InputDirPath
Description: Folder for PDFs, etc., to be processed

Name: ToBeFiledDirPath
Description: Folder for CVI files ready to submit to HERDS

Name: EmailOutDirPath
Description: Folder for export CVI files ready to emailed out

Name: EmailErrorsDirPath
Description: Folder for import CVI files with errors to be emailed out

Name: OutputDirPath
Description: Folder for completed CVI files and original PDFs

Name: vspsDirPath
Description: Optional folder for VSPS downloads

Name: EmailOnlyInputPath
Description: Optional folder for Email Only Input

Name: EmailOnlySendPath
Description: Optional folder for VSPS downloads

Name: CoKsXSLTFile
Description: XSLT transform file from Adobe to USAHA format data

Name: StdSchema
Description: XML Schema for CVI data files

Name: acrobatPath
Description: Optional path to Acrobat.exe file (for non Adobe default PDF application)

Name: ExportEmailTemplate
Description: Template file for export CVI emails

Name: ImportErrorsEmailTemplate
Description: Template file for import CVI error emails

Name: ImportErrorsLetterTemplate
Description: Template file for import CVI error cover letter

Name: EmailOnlyMessage
Description: Email content for Email Only CVIs

Name: vetTableFile
Description: Table with home state veterinarians

Name: sppTableFile
Description: Table with species list from HERDS

Name: errorTypeTableFile
Description: Table with error types from HERDS

Name: purposeTableFile
Description: Table with purpose of movement types

Name: stateVetTableFile
Description: Table with State Veterinarians' emails (supplied)

Name: zipcodeTableFile
Description: Table with Census zip code, state, and county (supplied)

Name: countiesTableFile
Description: Table with state, and county (supplied)

Name: countyAliasesTableFile
Description: Table with alternate spellings of counties

Name: robotInputPath
Description: Folder for CO/KS CVIs for robot to process automatically

Name: robotCompleteOutPath
Description: Folder for CO/KS CVIs once processed by robot

Name: robotXMLOutPath
Description: Folder for std XML generated from CO/KS CVIs by robot

Name: robotOutputFormat
Description: Output of robot processing in USAHA standard XML or raw Adobe XML (deprected)

Name: robotWaitSeconds
Description: Interval between checking for new input files in seconds

Name: logLevel
Description: Log only errors or informative log output as well

Name: log4j.rootLogger
Description: Log only errors or informative log output as well

Name: log4j.appender.stdout
Description: Do not change unless instructed

Name: log4j.appender.stdout.layout
Description: Do not change unless instructed

Name: log4j.appender.stdout.layout.ConversionPattern
Description: Do not change unless instructed

Name: log4j.appender.R
Description: Do not change unless instructed

Name: log4j.appender.R.File
Description: Do not change unless instructed

Name: log4j.appender.R.MaxFileSize
Description: Do not change unless instructed

Name: log4j.appender.R.MaxBackupIndex
Description: Do not change unless instructed

Name: log4j.appender.R.layout
Description: Do not change unless instructed

Name: log4j.appender.R.layout.ConversionPattern
Description: Do not change unless instructed
